game.title: BulletML For Unity
game.description:
BulletML for Unity is a simple and powerful plugin for Unity 4.3 or higher.
BulletML is a famous game library used in many shooters. It allows you to design and play some very complex bullet patterns with a simple XML file. It's especially useful in "Shoot'Em Up" games to create memorable boss fights or enemies.
game.history:
Pixelnest Studio wanted to use the BulletML library in their incoming shooter games. This way, they could create complex sequences and patterns and have better games.
Then, they decided to create a complete plugin, with documentation, examples and patterns. They published it on the Unity Asset Store to reach a large audience and have a taste of the potential of this online store.

features.feature: Simple and lightweight. No scripting required (if you don't want to).
XML files: easy ro read and to write.
Handle the difficulty directly within your patterns.
Bullet bank mechanism. Associate a pattern's bullet to a sprite easily.
